divs: Sighting Detailsi walked outside at 11:00pm having a talk with my wife and noticed to north northeast an object that looked like a triangle of stars.I always observe my surroundings being our house is in a somewhat wooded area.I look at the stars often.I noticed a triangle of stars that seemed to be darker in the middle than the surrounding sky.Then the triangle started to move.The craft turned so that the three stars were in a straight line then navigated to the north northeast at a fast rate.I felt very excited at the same time I felt very uneasy about what I had just seen.My wife was scared by the event.After it started moving my wife could not look like she was petrified by this.I have studied much on the subject but I have never seen such a sight.Afterwards I felt like it was trying to communicate with me some how.My wife last night saw something I have heard before,a manifestation of an objectin our yard.It was a blue grey mist that startded to form some type of humanoid shape.She got scared and came inside and told me this morning because I was sleeping.I tried to get a photo using my camera phone but did not capture it.
trends: There have been 34 other sightings in Naples
There were no other sightings in Naples on or around October 12th 2011
